name: Lost In The Woods (lightmercii)
description:
This is our first creative game for a project in SAE Institute. This game is based on a game called SlenderMan , and we are implementing a few things from that game into ours, you can called this a fan made game of Slender. With this game we are trying to answer the question Can exposure to mediated violence contribute desensitization and lack of empathy in real life? And we try to show this through the game.

Please do enjoy the game and write feedback, your opinions are always appreciated.

Instructions:

Press "P" to enable the players weapon, and Press "O" to disable it

Press the Shift Key to run

Lastly, Collect All Pages To Win!
